hand of man Ge 3:22, Ge 4:11, Ge 8:9 + oft.; [[תַּבְנִית יׇד]] Ez Eze 8:3 the shape of a hand (of God in Ezek,'s vision); of cherubim [[יַד אָדָם]] ´[[ת]] Eze 10:8, [[דְּמוּת יְדֵי אָדָם]] v:Eze 10:21:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: right hand ([[וֹ]])[[יַד־יְמִינ ]] Ge 48:17 (JE), Ju Jdg 7:20, 2Sa 20:9, Je 22:24, Ez Eze 39:3, Ps 73:23, Ps 121:5; [[הַיְמָנִית]][[[ם]]][[יד]] Ex 29:20, Le 8:23, Le 8:24, Le 14:14, Le 14:17, Le 14:25, Le 14:28 (all P); a left-handed man is [[אִטֵּר יַד־יְמִינוֹ]] Ju Jdg 3:15, Jdg 20:16 (V. [[אטר]]); left hand ([[וֹ]])[[יַד שְׂמאׁל]] Jdg 3:21, Jdg 7:20, Ez Eze 39:8; both hands of one pers. are denoted by du., [[יׇדַיִם]] Ge 27:22, 2Ki 3:11 + oft.; occasionally + numeral, [[שְׁתֵּי יׇדָָי]] De 9:15, De 9:17, so Le 16:21 (P); du. also of hands of several persons Ge 5:29, Ex 29:10, Ex 29:15, Ex 29:19, De 31:29, 2Ki 11:16 = 2Ch 23:15, Ez Eze 21:12 + ; yet sts. sg. of hand of several persons Ge 19:16, Ex 29:9, Le 8:24, De 1:25, De 17:7, De 17:7, Ju Jdg 7:20, Jdg 7:20 +

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[שְׁתֵּי כַּפּוֹת ידיו]] 1Sa 5:4 the two palms of his hands; [[כַּפּוֹת הידים]] 2Ki 9:35, Da 10:10; [[אַצִּילוֹת יׇדֶיְ]] armpits  Je 38:12, Ez Eze 13:18; [[בּׂהֶן יׇדָיו]] Ex 29:20 (P) = his thumbs (opp. [[בּׂהֶן רַגְלָם]]); [[בְּהׂנוֹת]] ([[יו]])[[ורגל]] ([[יו]])[[יד]] Ju Jdg 1:6, Jdg 1:7; bracelets were worn on hands, i.e. wrists Ge 24:22, Ge 24:30, Ge 24:47 (J), cf. thread bound on hand of Zerach Ge 38:28, Ge 38:28, Ge 38:29, Ge 38:30 (J), and cords on hands of Samson Ju Jdg 15:14; the ring was worn on hand, i.e. finger Ge 41:42 (E), Es 3:10.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: as to hands in use, note [[זְרׂעַי ידיו]] Ge 49:24 arms of his hands, i.e. arms which make his hands serviceable; [[מִלֵּא יׇדוֹ בַּקֶּשֶׁת]] 2Ki 9:24 he filled his hand with the bow, i.e. caused his hand to grasp it, seized it; [[הַרְכֵּב יׇדְֽ ְעַל־הַקֶּשֶׁת]] 2Ki 13:16, 2Ki 13:16; esp. fig. of consecrating or installing (as priest), [[מִלֵּא יַד]] he filled the hand of any one (perh. orig. gave the selected portions of animal-sacrifices to, v. Le 8:25 ff, so Di), installed as priest Ju Jdg 17:5, Jdg 17:12. 1Ki 13:33 (sq. [[וְ]] subord.); elsewhere only P and late: Ex 28:41 (‖[[קִדַּשׁ]]), Ex 29:9 also v:Ex 29:29 (‖[[משׁח]]), v:Ex 29:33 [[קדּשׁ]], v:Ex 29:35, Le 8:33, 2Ch 13:9, Le 16:33, sq. inf. Le 16:33 (‖[[משׁח]]), Le 21:10 (‖[[יוּחַק שֶׁמֶן]]), Nu 3:3(‖[[משׁח]]); [[מִלֵּאתֶם]] [[יֶרְכֶם ליהוה]] 2Ch 29:31 = ye have consecrated yourselves to ´[[י]], is addressed appar. to the whole congregation (otherwise Be Öt, and Di Ex 32:29); so the same expression Ex 32:29; so the same expression Ex 32:29 (poss.) and 1Ch 29:5 (certainly) of offering gifts to ´[[י]]; [[מִלְאוּ יׇד֠ו]] Ez Eze 43:26 of consecrating the altar (‖[[כִּפֶּר]], [[טִהַר]]); [[שָׁלַח יֵד לְ]] Ju Jdg 5:26 stretch out hand to, so [[ישׁלח אֶל־]] 2Sa 6:6 (insert [[ידו]] Vrss Dr); hence [[ם]]([[כ]])[[מִשְׁלַח יד]] that to which one puts the hand, fig., = undertaking, † De 12:7, De 12:18, De 15:10, De 23:21, De 28:8, De 28:20 †; [[שׁלח יד]] also in hostile sense, c. [[בְּ]], Ex 22:7, 1Sa 24:7, 1Sa 24:11, 1Sa 26:11, Ps 55:21 +; cf. [[מוֹאָב מִשְׁלוֹתֵ יׇדָם]] Is 11:14; [[אֶבֶן־יׇד]] Nu 35:17 (P) a stone (thrown from) the hand; [[כְּלִי עֵץ־יׇד]] v:Nu 35:18 a weapon in the hand; [[מַקֵּל יׇד]] Ez Eze 39:9 a staff in the hand; idols are ´[[מַעֲשֵׂה יְדֵי וגו]] Is 2:8 + oft. v. [[מַעֲשֶׂה]]; man is work of God's hand Job 14:15.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: special phrases: kissing with the hand [[וַתִּשַּׁק]] [[יׇדִי לְפִי]] Job 31:27; (in silence) [[יׇדִי שַׂמְתִּי לְמוֹ פִי]] Job 40:4, Mic 7:16 ([[עַל־פֶּה]]); the creditor is [[בַּעַל מַשֵּׁה יׇדוֹ]] De 15:2; the debt [[מַשָּׁא כָל־יׇד]] Ne 10:32; [[תְּרוּמַת יֶרְכֶם]] De 12:6, De 12:11, De 12:17 heave-offering of your hand; the hand is placed [[תחת יׇרֵךְ]] in taking an oath Ge 24:2 (J); lifted ([[הרים]]) to ´[[י]] Ge 14:22; so perhaps [[יׇד עַל־כֵּס יׇהּ]] Ex 17:16 (E) hand on the throne of Yah ! (but difficult, v. Di VB) ; oft. c. [[נשׂא]] the hand is lifted ([[נשׂא]]) to heaven De 32:40 (of ´[[י]]'s oath, poem); elsewh. chiefly Ez and P: simply lift ([[נשׂא]]) the hand (= [[נשׁבע]]), sq, inf. Ex 6:8, Nu 14:30 (both P), Ez Eze 20:28, Eze 20:42, Eze 47:14; sq. [[לְ]] pers. Ez Eze 20:5, Eze 20:5 (del. Co as gloss); sq. [[לְ]] pers. + inf. Ez Eze 20:6, Eze 20:15, Eze 20:23; abs. Eze 36:7; hence (citations) Ne 9:15, Ps 106:26; cf. Ne 8:6 the people answered [[אָמֵן אָמֵן בְּמׂעַל יְדֵיהֶם]]; ([[ים]])[[נשׂא יד]] elsewh. (of men) in prayer Ps 28:2; cf. Ps 68:32, and [[יׇדִי לַיְלָה נִגְּרָה]] Ps 77:3. Also of God, to give a signal Is 49:29; to rescue Ps 10:12. [[יְנׁפֵף יׇדוֹ]] Is 10:32 he brandisheth his hand (Assyrian, in defiance); [[הֵנִיף]] [[יׇדוֹ]] Is 11:15 (of ´[[י]] in judgment), cf.Is 19:16, Zec 2:13 (sq. [[על]]); [[הֵנִיעַ יׇדוֹ]]); Zep 2:15 (in derision); [[הוֹשִׁיעַ ידלְ]] one's hand bringing deliverance to, gaining success, by force, for 1 S 1Sa 25:26 + (v. Dr), ins. also v:1Sa 25:31 (LXX We Dr); the hand is weary [[יׇגְֽעָה]] 2Sa 23:10, it cleaves ([[דבק]]) to the sword ([[אֶל־הַחֶרֶב]]) v:2Sa 23:10 (both om. by accident in ‖ 1Ch 11:13, see VB); [[שֶׁכֶר יׇד]] Le 21:9 (H) fracture of hand = arm (‖[[שֶׁבֶר רגל]]); after [[נׇתַן]]: give a pledge [[וִיִּתְּנוּ יׇדָם לְהוֹחִיא נְשֵׁיהֶם]] Ezr 10:19; submit [[נׇחַן יַד תַּחַת שְׁמֽׂה]] 1Ch 29:24, i.e. they acknowledged him as their lord; [[תְּנו־יׇד ליהוה]]; 2Ch 30:8; other phr. c. prep. v. infr.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: of hand as strong, helpful, etc.:—(I) of man : [[עׂחֶם יׇדִי]] De 8:17 (‖[[כּׂחִי]]); of fighting power of Edom [[בְּיׇד חֲזׇקָה]] Nu 20:20 (JE ; ‖[[בְּעַם כָּבֵד]]; cf. infr. of God); [[קִחְרֵי־יׇד]] small in power 2Ki 19:26 = Is 37:27 (cf. infr. of God); Isr. went out of Egypt [[בְּיׇד רָמָה]] acc. to P, Ex 14:8, Nu 33:3 i.e. boldly, defiantly ; same phr. of presumptuousness (against ´[[י]]) Nu 15:30 (P, cf. [[יׇדֵנוּ רָ֫מָה]]De 32:27). Phrases of strengthening are: [[חִוַּק יׇדָתו]] Ju Jdg 9:24, Ne 6:9; [[חִזֵּק בְּיׇדַיִם]] Ezr 1:6; [[החזיק בְּיַד־]] Job 8:20 (v. [[חזק]]); [[לִהְיוֹת יׇדָיו אִתּוֹ]] 2Ki 15:19 that his hands might be with him, to confirm the kingdom in his hand; note also [[מִי־הוּא לְיׇדִי יִתׇּקֵעַ]] Job 17:3 who is he (that) will strike his hand into mine, i.e. give me a pledge (v. sub [[תקע]]); strength fails when hands drop: [[וַיִּרְפּוּ יׇדָיו]] 2Sa 4:1 then his hands dropped down, he grew feeble, spiritless (v. [[רפה]]); [[רְפֵי יׇדַיִם]] 2Sa 17:2 weak-handed, weak (‖[[יׇגֵעַ]]). (2) of (mighty) hand of God, pointing to earlier anthropomorphism; as strengthening Joseph Ge 49:24 (poem in J); as stretched out ([[שׁלח]]) to smite Ex 9:15 (J); so of ´[[מַלְאַךְ י]] 2Sa 24:16, sq. acc. + [[לְ]] inf., opp. [[הֶ֫רֶף יׇדְֶָ]] v:2Sa 24:16; as smiting ([[נׇֽגְעָה בְּ]]) 1Sa 6:9, Job 19:21; as against ([[בְ]] among, in) cattle, etc., v:Job 19:3 (J); city 1Sa 5:9; the murrain v:1Sa 5:3 (J); [[יַד־יהוה]] as heavy against ([[כבדה אֶל]]) 1Sa 5:6; [[שָׁם כָּֽבְרָה]] v:1Sa 5:11; [[קָֽשְׁתה עַל]] v:1Sa 5:7 of withdrawal of ´[[י]]'s chastising hand [[תָּסוּר יׇדוֹ מִכֶּם]] 1Sa 6:3; and (´[[י]] subj.) [[יׇקֵל אֶת־יׇדוֹ מֵעֲלֵיכֶם]] v:1Sa 6:5; of ´[[י]]'s power to deliver his people:—† [[חׂ֫זֶק יׇד]] Ex 13:3, Ex 13:14, Ex 13:16 (a11 JE) †; [[יׇד חֲזׇקָה]] Ex 6:1, Ex 6:1 (JE), Ex 13:9 (JE), De 6:21, De 7:8, Jos 4:24 (D); esp: in phr. [[זְרוֹעַ נְטוּיׇה]]([[בִ]])[[יׇד חֲזׇקָה וּ]]([[בְּ]]) De 4:34 + (v. [[זְרוֹעַ]] p. 284); [[יד חזקה]] + [[כּׂחַ גׇּדוֹל]] Ex 32:11 (JE), Ne 1:10; [[תִּקְחָָר הֲיַד]] ´[[י]] Nu 11:23 (JE) is the hand of ´[[י]] shortened ? Is 50:2, Is 59:1 (both sq. [[מִן]]); [[יׇד נְטוּיׇה]] in judgment Is 9:11, Is 9:16, Is 9:20, Is 10:4; ([[ו]])[[עלי]] ´[[הָֽיְתָה יַד־י]] of grasp of ´[[י]]'s hand in prophetic inspiration Ez Eze 1:3, Eze 3:22, Eze 37:1, Eze 40:1, 2Ki 3:15; [[עָלַי חזקה]] ´[[יַד־י]] Ez Eze 3:14; so [[בְּחֶזְקַת הַיׇּדָ]] Is 8:11; of God's (´[[י]]'s) good hand = favour, (late) [[יַד]] ([[יו]])[[טוֹבָה על]] ([[יו]])[[אלה]] Ezr 7:9, Ezr 8:18, Ne 2:8, Ne 2:18; without [[טוֹבָה]] Ezr 7:6, Ezr 7:28, Ezr 8:22, Ezr 8:31; sq. inf, [[יַד האלהים לָתֵת לָהֶם]] 2Ch 30:12; [[בְּיׇֽדְ ְלְגַדֵּל]] 1Ch 29:12; in gen. [[כּׂחַ וּגְבוּרָה בְּיׇֽדְְ]] v:1Ch 29:12; of protection [[בְּחֵל יׇדוֹ]] Is 49:2 in the shadow of his (´[[י]]'s) hand.

Fig.= strength, power:—[[לָנוּס לאׁ הָיׇה בָהֶם יׇדָיִם]] Jos 8:20 (JE) there was not in them strength to flee; [[לאׁ מָֽחְאוּ כָל־אַנְשֵׁי־חַיִל יְדֵיהֶם]] Ps 76:6 none of the men of might have found their hands, i.e. their powers are paralyzed in death (‖[[נׇמוּ שְׁנׇתָם]]); with ref. to pecuniary ability: [[תַּ גִּיעַ יׇדוֹ דֵּי שֶׂה]] Le 5:7 (on this and others c. [[דֵּי]] v. [[דַּי]] p. 191); [[לִשְׁתֵּי תוֹרִים תַּגִּיעַ יׇדוֹ]] v:Le 5:11 if his hand do not reach to two turtledoves; [[אֵין יׇדוֹ מַשֶּׂגֶת]] Le 14:21 if his hand be unable to reach; so combinations with [[נשׂג]] Hiph.: v:Le 14:22, v:Le 14:30, v:Le 14:31, v:Le 14:32, Nu 6:21 (all foregoing P), Le 25:26, Le 25:47, Le 25:49, Le 27:8 (all H), Ez Eze 46:7; [[כְּמִתְּנַת יׇדוֹ]] De 16:17 according to the giving of his hand, i.e. his ability; similarly [[מַתַּת יׇדוֹ]] Ez Eze 46:5, Eze 46:11; on [[יֶשׁ־לְאֵל יׇדִי]] Ge 31:29, etc., v. II. [[אֵל]] p. 43:a supr.; other phr. c. prep. v. infr.; of dominion of king [[לְהָשִׁיב יׇדוֹ בְּ]] 2Sa 8:3 rd. prob. as ‖ 1Ch 18:3 [[לְהַצִּיב יׇדוֹ בְּ]] to establish his dominion at; hand = display of strength, action of ´[[י]] Ps 78:42, Job 27:11, De 34:12; esp. ´[[הַיׇּד הַיׇּד הַגְּדׂלָה אֲשֶׁר עָשָׂה י]] Ex Ex 14:31 (J) = the great achievement which ´[[י]] did.
Fig.= side:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of way [[יַד דֶּרֶךְ]] 1Sa 4:13 Qr (Kt [[יך]]; but rd. prob. [[לְיַד השׁער]] v. Dr.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of gate [[בְּעַד יַד־הַשַּׁעַר]] 1Sa 4:18 (txt. dub., v. Dr).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of stream or wady [[כָּל־יַד נַחַל יַבּׂק]] De 2:37. Esp. du.:

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of land, [[ארץ רַחֲבַת יׇדַיִם]] Ge 34:21 (P) the land is wide of (on) both hands, i.e. in both directions, Ju Jdg 18:10, Is 22:18, 1Ch 4:40; of city Ne 7:4; of sea Ps 104:25; of streams [[רַחֲבֵי יׇדָָיִם]] Is 33:21; [[מִיּד כִּתִּים]] Nu 24:24 (JE) from the direction of Kittim.—Other phr. c. prep. v. infr.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: side = place, properly place at one side [[לְךָ מִחוּץ לַמַּחֲנֶה וְיׇד תִּהְיֶה]] De 23:13; [[אִישׁ אֶת־יׇדוֹ]] Je 6:3 each (in) his place; so [[כָּל־אִישׁ עַל־יׇדוֹ]] Nu 2:17 (P);—v. other phrases c. prep. infr.
[[יׇד]] is used in various special, technical senses:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: sign, monument 1Sa 15:12, 2Sa 18:18. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: part, fractional part or share: of seed Ge 47:24 (J); share in king 2Sa 19:44; of fighting men 2Ki 11:17; of people Ne 11:1 †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: time, repetition Ge 43:34 (J), Da 1:20. Also f. pl. (only in fig. senses):—†

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: axle-trees 1Ki 7:32, 1Ki 7:33 (SyrVer 0iyodahoto0). †

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: stays, supports for laver 1Ki 7:35, 1Ki 7:36; stays at sides of throne 1Ki 10:19, 1Ki 10:19 = 2Ch 9:18, 2Ch 9:18. †

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: tenons on sides of boards of tabernacle [[שְׁתֵּי יׇדוֹת]] Ex 26:17 (P), also v:Ex 26:19, v:Ex 26:19, Ex 36:22, Ex 36:24, Ex 36:24.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[יׇד חָזִית]] Is 57:8 acc. to Hi De Che Or Brd Du and most = a phallus thou beholdest; this favoured by context but without support in Heb. usage; Di a (beckoning) hand.
[[יַד]] with prep.:—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אֶל־יַד]]:—(1) after vb. of motion, into the charge, custody, of Es 2:3, Es 2:8, Es 2:8, Es 2:14; (2) [[אֶל־יַד]] by the side of gate 2Sa 18:4; [[אֶל־יׇדִי]] by my side, next to me 2Sa 14:30; [[אֶל־יַד דֶּרֶךְ]] Ez Eze 48:1 a; [[אֶליַד חֲמָת]] v:b (but on txt. v. Co); cf. also [[לְיַד]], [[עַל־יַד]].

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[בְּיַד]] into the hand: (1) [[נׇתַן בְּיַד]] give into the hand of, lit., Ge 27:17; (2) into the possession of [[נׇתַן בְּיַד]] Ex 10:25 (JE); esp. (3) [[נתן ביד]] = give into the power of, deliver over to Jos 6:2, Jos 7:7 (both JE), De 1:27, Ju Jdg 2:14 a, Jdg 13:1, Jdg 15:12, 1Ki 22:6, 2Ki 18:30, 2Ki 19:10; [[מָכַר בְּיַד]] sell into the hand of Ju Jdg 2:14 b, Jdg 3:8, Jdg 4:2, Jdg 4:9, Jdg 10:7; [[נפל בְּיַד]]) fall into the hand of Jdg 15:18, 2Sa 24:14; [[וַיְשַׁלְּחֵם בְּיַד פִּשְׁעָם]] Job 8:4 and he delivered them into the power of their transgression, gave them over to it; also Is 64:6, which read [[וַתְּמַגְּנֵנוּ]] for MT [[וַתְּמוּגֵנוּ]]; (4) [[נתן בְּיַד]] = entrust to Ge 30:35, Ge 32:17.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[בְּיַד]] in the hand of: (1) lit. [[מַטְּ ְאֲשֶׁר בְּיׇדְֶָ]] Ge 38:18 (J) thy staff which is in thy hand, Ex 7:17 (J), Ex 17:9 (E), Ex 32:15, Nu 22:23, Nu 22:31, Jos 5:13, Jos 8:18 (all JE), 1Sa 13:22, 1Sa 14:27, 1Sa 17:50, 1Sa 18:10, 1Sa 20:10, 2Ki 11:8, 2Ki 11:11 = 2Ch 23:7, Am 7:7, Is 6:6, Ez Eze 40:3, Eze 40:5, Eze 47:3, Zec 2:5, Zec 8:4; [[אֵין בְּיׇדִי רָעָה וׇפֶ֫שַׁע]] 1Sa 14:12 there is not in my hand evil or transgression (orig. prob. of stains of blood, or other evidences of crime); [[מַה־בְּיׇדִי רָעָה]] 1Sa 26:18; (2) fig. in the possession of, Ex 21:16 (JE); [[נִמְחָא בְּיׇדִי]] 1Sa 9:8 there is found in my hand, i.e. I happen to have (1/4 shekel); (3) in the (physical) power of Ge 16:6 (J; cf. [[תִּתְעַנִּי תַּחַת יׇדֶיהָ]] v:Ge 16:9), Job 1:12; [[בְּיַד לָשׁוֹן]] Pr 18:21 in the power of a tongue; in the care or charge of, entrusted to, Ge 39:23 (J); under the authority of 2Sa 18:2, 2Sa 18:2, 2Sa 18:2, Nu 31:49 (P);—Je 41:9 (AV because of Gedaliah), rd. [[בּוֹר גׇּדוֹל הוּא]] for [[ביד גדליהו הוא]] LXX Hi Kue Gf Che Gie Dr:Sm 291; (4) [[בְּיַד]] also with vbs. of taking, [[וַיִּקַּח בְּיׇדוֹ אֶת־הָאֵשׁ]] Ge 22:6 and he took the fire in his hand, Ex 4:17, Ex 4:20, Ex 4:21 (all E), 1Sa 17:40, 2Ki 9:1; thence to denote accompaniment, taking or being with one Jos 9:11 (JE), 2Sa 8:10, 1Ki 14:3, 2Ki 5:5; [[אִישׁ שׁוֹרוֹ בְּיׇדוֹ]] 1Sa 14:34 cf. 1Sa 16:2; [[קַח בְּיׇֽדְ ְשְׁלשִׁים אֲנׇשִׁים]] Je 38:10.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: [[בְּיַד]] by the agency or instrumentality of Ge 38:20 (J), Ju Jdg 6:36, 1Sa 11:7, 1Sa 16:20, 2Sa 3:18, 2Sa 10:2, 2Sa 11:4, 2Sa 12:25, 2Ki 14:27 (the orig. lit. sense of discernible in some of these); esp. of ´[[י]]'s speaking by the agency of prophets Ex 9:35 (R), Le 8:36, Le 10:11, Nu 4:37, Nu 4:45, Nu 9:23, Nu 10:13, Nu 17:5, Jos 14:2, Jos 20:2, Jos 21:2, Jos 21:8 (all P), 1Sa 28:15, 1Sa 28:17, 1Ki 16:7, 1Ki 16:12, 1Ki 16:34, 2Ki 9:36, 2Ki 17:13, 2Ki 17:23, 2Ch 1:17, 2Ch 7:6, 2Ch 10:15, 2Ch 33:8, 2Ch 34:14, 2Ch 35:6, Ne 8:14, Ne 9:14, Ne 9:30; ´[[מוּת בְּיַד י]] Ex 16:3 (P) die by the hand of ´[[י]]; [[בְּיַד]] by or at the side of (very rare) Zec 4:12 olive-branches beside the two golden pipes; = near to, in time, [[נׇכוֹן בְּיׇדוֹ יוֹם חשֶׁךְ]] Job 15:23 ready at his hand is a day of darkness (i.e. near at hand).

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[כְּיַד הַמֶּלֶךְ]] 1Ki 10:13 acc. to the hand of the king, i.e. his royal munificence, so Es 2:18 cf. Es 1:7.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: [[מִיַּד]] out of the hand:—(1) out of power of, often nearly = [[מִן]], used idomat. c. many vbs.: c. [[הִצִּיל]] Gn Ge 32:12, Ge 32:12 (J), Ex 2:19, Ex 18:9, Ex 18:10, Ex 18:10 (all JE), 1Sa 17:37; [[מִתַּחַת יַד]] Ex 18:10 (JE; so c. [[פשׁע]] 2Ch 21:8, 2Ch 21:10, 2Ch 21:10; cf.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: infr.); of animals [[מִיַּד]] 1Sa 17:37, 1Sa 17:37, [[מִיַּד־כֶּלֶב]] Ps 22:21; even of inanimate things [[הִצִּיל מִיַּד לֶהָבָה]] Is 47:14; c. [[לָקַח]] Nu 21:26 (JE), 1Ki 11:34, 1Ki 11:35; c. [[קָרַע]] v:1Ki 11:12, v:1Ki 11:31; c. [[מִלֵּט]], [[מִיַּד שְׁאוֹל]] ´[[מ]] Ps 89:49; c. [[פָּדָה]], [[מִיַּד שְׁאוֹל]] ´[[פ]] Ho 13:14 (‖[[מִמָּ֫וֶת]]), Ps 49:16; [[מִידֵי חֶרֶב]] ´[[פ]] Job 5:20; pregn. [[יִשְׁפְּטֵנִי מִיׇּדְֶָ]] 1Sa 24:16 may he (´[[י]]) judge (and save) me out of thy hand; so 2Sa 18:19 and (with [[רִיב]] for [[שׁפט]]) 1Sa 25:39; (2) [[מִיּד]] of separation, [[מִיׇּֽדְ ְנִגְזָָרוּ]] Ps 88:6 of wicked, cut off from nearness to God; (3) [[מִיַּד דָּרַשׁ]] exact (at the hand) of 2Sa 4:11, Ge 9:5, Ge 9:5 (P), Ez Eze 33:6, Eze 34:10 (= [[דָּרַשׁ מֵעִם]] De 18:19), also of animals Ge 9:5; [[בִּקֵּשׁ מִיַּר]] Ez Eze 33:8; [[קָנׇה מִיַּד]] Ru 4:5, Ru 4:9 acquire at the hand of; with ref. to offerings [[הִקְרִיב מִיַּד]] Le 22:25 (H), [[רָחָה מִיֵּד]] (´[[י]] subj.) Mal 1:10, Mal 1:13; [[רָחוֹן מִיַּד לָקַח]] Mal 2:13.

definitions.title: h.
definitions.body: ([[י]])[[עַל־יד]]:—(1) upon the hand(s) of [[תְּנׇה אׂתוֹ עַל־יׇדִי]] Ge 42:37 = entrust him to me (E; lit. put him upon my hand); [[חָָרֶב יַגִּירֻהוּ עַל־יְדֵי־]] Ps 63:11 they shall pour him out upon the hands of the sword = deliver him up to the sword; so Je 18:21, Ez Eze 35:5; (2) [[עַל־יַד]], [[עַל־יְדֵי]] acc. to the hand(s) of = at the guidance, direction of: [[עַל־יַד]] 1Ch 25:2 a, 2Ch 26:13; [[עַל־יְדֵי]] Je 5:31, Je 33:13, and esp. Chr: 1Ch 25:2 b, 1Ch 25:3, 1Ch 25:6, 1Ch 25:6; [[עַל־יְדֵי דָוִיד]] 2Ch 23:18, Ezr 3:10; [[עַל־יְדֵי כְּלִי דָוִיד]] 2Ch 29:27 acc. to the guidance of the instruments of David; (3) by the side of, way [[הַשַּׁעַר עַל־יַד דֶּרֶךְ]] 2Sa 15:2; river ([[היאר]])[[עַל־יַד ]] Ex 2:5 (E), Nu 13:29 (JE; ‖[[עַל־הַיׇּם]]), Je 46:6, Da 10:4; city Jos 15:46 (JE); person ( = in the company of) 2Sa 15:18; people 2Ch 21:16; esp. late [[עַל־יַד]] next to (in a series) 2Ch 17:15, 2Ch 17:16, 2Ch 17:18, 2Ch 31:15, Ne 3:2, Ne 3:2 + 13 t. Ne 3, Ne 13:13; [[עַל־יְדֵי]] by the side of Ju Jdg 11:26; people ([[אדום]])[[עַל־יְדֵי ]] Nu 34:3 (P), 1Ch 7:29; cattle Job 1:14; [[שִׁיר הֶעֱמִיד עַל־יְדֵי]] 1Ch 6:16 he stationed them by the side of song, i.e. to watch over the singing.

definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: [[תַּחַת יַד]] under the hand = in the possession, at the disposal of; ´[[וְאִין יֶשׁ־פּׂה תַַחַת־יׇֽדְ ְחֲנִית וגו]] 1Sa 21:9; = in the power of, subject to Is 3:6 come, thou shalt be our ruler and this ruin under thy hand; pl. sq. vb., [[וְהִתְעַנִּי תַּחַת יׇדֶיהָ]] Ge 16:9 (J) and submit thyself under her hands, her authority, Is 3:6.—[[מִתַּחַת יַד]] v.

definitions.title: g.
definitions.body: (1) supr., and sub [[תַּחַת]].
